【词根】swad-,&nbsp;sweet_丁朝阳_新浪博客 ... ☆ dissuade 劝阻，劝止 ☆ suasion 说服，劝告 ☆ suavity 柔和，温和；愉快.

list.abs: 系泊索具moral hazard道德危险moral suasion道德劝说moratorium
9. 间接管制中的道义说服 (moral suasion) 是怎样的做法？ 效果如何？

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, or from Latin suasio(n-), from suadere 'to urge'

means.word_mean: 1. the act of persuading (or attempting to persuade); communication intended to induce belief or action

auth_sentence.content: The problem of illegitimacy isn't soluble through moral suasion.
auth_sentence.res_content: The problem of illegitimacy isn't soluble through moral suasion.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The problem of illegitimacy isn't soluble through moral suasion.

auth_sentence.content: Nor does it mean we can rely on the power of argument and moral suasion.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nor does it mean we can rely on the power of argument and moral suasion.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nor does it mean we can rely on the power of argument and moral suasion.
